body_html: My concern about #508 is that it has degenerated into the nice-to-have 'go add a line to every op' with 'contributions welcome' and I'm not sure anyone is going to do it, whereas 'the doc that we already have is actively wrong and generates NotImplemented exceptions' seems a bit more urgent. I'd be happy to update #508 with the info from here if you can suggest someone to assign it to so it gets done.
